entry.title: getpeerinfo results
entry.summary: The latest source code level from Github shows that the 'services' field is garbled when connected to Bitcoind on a Java node server at 127.0.0.1:8333. Although a bad 'version' message was initially suspected, using 0.8.6 resulted in correct results, indicating a change in the field between 0.8.6 and 0.9.0. The bitcoin-cli command to getpeerinfo was used to compare the 'services' field for both versions of Bitcoind, with the result that the 'services' field in version 0.9.0 appeared garbled with a value of "0000000164x", while in version 0.8.6 it was "00000001".
